intro: Haumania liebrechtsiana, commonly known as the velvetleaf. It is a perennial herb native to South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are covered in a dense layer of soft, velvety hairs. It produces small, greenish-yellow flowers that bloom in clusters, followed by capsule fruits containing numerous seeds. Haumania liebrechtsiana is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
